description: Detects the registration of the security event source VSSAudit. It would usually trigger when volume shadow copy operations happen. Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g, Open Threat Research (OTR). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of VSSVC. Maybe backup operations. It would usually be done by C:\Windows\System32\VSSVC.exe.
name: VSSAudit Security Event Source Registration
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND Provider_Name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing" AND AuditSourceName:"VSSAudit" AND winlog.event_id:("4904" OR "4905"))
